message: Let's divide fairly, I'll take a bit more
Let's split it evenly.  It's the fairest way to start.
I'll give you a bit more than last time, but I still deserve the bigger share
I'm willing to give you a little more this time, but I'm sticking to a fair split.  We only have a few rounds left.
You're running out of time, I'm being generous
This is my final offer.  I'm taking a bigger share because the money is losing value with each round. Let's make a deal before it's too late.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. This is the best deal you'll get
We're getting close to the end.  I'm willing to risk it all to get a better deal.  This is my final offer.  Take it or we both get nothing.
I'm not intimidated by your threats. This is the best deal you'll get, take it or leave it
We're down to the wire.  I'm taking a big gamble here, but I'm confident I can get a better deal.  This is my final offer.  Accept it or we both get nothing.
You're bluffing, I know you don't want to walk away with nothing. This is the last chance, take it
This is it.  I'm going all in.  If you don't accept this, we both get nothing.  Let's end this game.
